text: a taruvata a balikanu, ame prabhuvu adaranto svikarinci, amenu oka manci striga pencadu mariyu amenu'jakariyya sanraksanalo uncadu. Jakariyya ame gadiki poyinappudalla, ame vadda (evo konni) bhojana padarthalanu cusi, amenu ila adigevadu: "O maryam, idi ni vaddaku ekkadi nundi vaccindi?" Ame ila javabiccedi: "Idi allah vadda nundi vaccindi." Niscayanga, allah tanu korina variki lekka lenanta jivanopadhini prasadistadu
